TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 213
TEI.2.document_title: J M Beramendi to Stephen F Austin, 04-30-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. M. Berramendi to Austin, Bexar, April 30, 1829. " There is such a lack of money, due to the Government's failure to pay troops of Bexar, that merchants have no money to trade with your colony." (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 213

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. M. Berramendi to Austin, Bexar, April 30, 1829. " There is such a lack of money, due to the Government's failure to pay troops of Bexar, that merchants have no money to trade with your colony." (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="04-30-1829">April 30, 1829*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
